title: Jacqui Smith – 2008 Speech at the Philip Lawrence Awards
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Jacqui Smith, the then Home Secretary, on 2 December 2008.
content:
I am very pleased to be here today to meet the Philip Lawrence Award winners.
